scenario_text.value: Look here! There’s something in the water!
There is? I don’t see anything...

It’s there, I swear! Maybe humans can’t see
it? I bet it’s pretty important, though!

(Humans can’t see it... Oh, I know. I’ll try
<color=#B41919>looking with my camera</color>.)

Can’t tell if it’s related to Shuuji at all,
but you should check it out!
